```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN", zipcode == 10014, grade != "Not Yet Graded", grade == c("A", "B", "C")) %>% 
  mutate(grade = as.factor(grade), grade = fct_relevel(grade, "C", "B", "A"), cuisine_description = recode(cuisine_description, "Latin (Cuban, Dominican, Puerto Rican, South & Central American)" = "Latin"), cuisine_description = as.factor(cuisine_description))
  
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  group_by(cuisine_description, grade) %>% 
  summarize(n_obs = n()) %>% 
  group_by(cuisine_description) %>% 
  mutate(percent = round(100*n_obs/sum(n_obs), 2), cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, percent)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~cuisine_description, y = ~percent, type = "scatter", color = ~grade) 

```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(cuisine_description == c("American", "French", "Italian", "Japanese")) %>% 
  group_by(cuisine_description, grade) %>% 
  summarize(n_obs = n()) %>% 
  group_by(cuisine_description) %>% 
  mutate(percent = round(100*n_obs/sum(n_obs), 2), text_label = str_c("Grade:", grade, "\nPercent within Cuisine: ", percent, "%")) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~cuisine_description, y = ~n_obs, type = "bar", color = ~grade, text = ~text_label) %>%
  layout(yaxis = list(title = 'Count'), barmode = 'stack') %>% 
  layout(xaxis = list(title = 'Cuisine Type'))
```
